name: Memory Trees
summary:
Memory Trees  is a RPG Life+Farming simulation game . 
The game will be quite big. 
I imagine that there will be shops to buy tools, items for harvesting, planting, fishing, etc. 
Tbe game will also feature events to increase your relationship with your crush.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 3D RPG Life+Farming Game
  • 官方网站: https://sites.google.com/site/memorialtreesforgetmenot/
  • 官方网站: https://amusant.itch.io/memory-trees-forget-me-not
